name: BLOCK-T190
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T190 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T190.
type: object
properties:
  run_filter:
    description: LATISS filter to use.
    type: string
    default: "SDSSr_65mm"
  run_grating:
    description: LATISS grating to use.
    type: string
    default: "empty_1"
  run_target_sky_counts:
    description: Target sky counts.
    type: number
    default: 15000
  run_n_flats:
    description: Target number of flats.
    type: integer
    default: 10
  run_dither:
    description: Dither distance in arcsec.
    type: number
    default: 10
  run_max_exp:
    description: Maximum exposure time allowed.
    type: number
    default: 300
  run_distance_from_sun:
    description: Distance from sun in degrees.
    type: number
    default: 179.0
  run_target_el:
    description: Target elevation for sky flats.
    type: number
    default: 45.0
